languages.text: "Еще раз приношу свои сожаления о том, что Ваша Светлость сталкивается с таким количеством угроз на моей станции".
"I once again offer my apologies for the sheer number of threats that Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} has encountered since arriving on my station."
languages.original_text: "Еще раз приношу свои сожаления о том, что Ваша Светлость сталкивается с таким количеством угроз на моей станции".

traits.locale_text: "I once again offer my apologies for the sheer number of threats that Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} has been encountering on my station."
"I once again offer my apologies for the sheer number of threats that Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} has been encountering on my station."
"I once again offer my apologies for the sheer number of threats that Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} has encountered since arriving on my station."
"I once again offer my apologies for the sheer number of threats that Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} has encountered since arriving on my station."
"I once again offer my apologies for the sheer number of threats that Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} has encountered since arriving on my station."

languages.text: 「このステーションに到着してからというもの、陛下が幾度となく恐ろしい目に遭ったこと、改めてお詫びする」
languages.original_text: "I once again offer my apologies for the sheer number of threats that Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} has encountered since arriving on my station."

traits.locale_text: 「このステーションに到着してからというもの、陛下が幾度となく恐ろしい目に遭ったこと、改めてお詫びする」

languages.text: “您来到落脚港之后，遭遇了各种各样的威胁。我再次为此向您致歉，大人。”
languages.original_text: "I once again offer my apologies for the sheer number of threats that Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} has encountered since arriving on my station."

traits.locale_text: “您来到落脚港之后，遭遇了各种各样的威胁。我再次为此向您致歉，大人。”

languages.text: «Le vuelvo a ofrecer mis disculpas por el ingente número de amenazas que {mf|milord|milady} ha encontrado desde que llegó a mi estación».
languages.original_text: "I once again offer my apologies for the sheer number of threats that Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} has encountered since arriving on my station."

traits.locale_text: «Le vuelvo a ofrecer mis disculpas por el ingente número de amenazas que {mf|milord|milady} ha encontrado desde que llegó a mi estación».

languages.text: « Une fois encore, je vous présente toutes mes excuses pour le nombre de menaces auxquelles vous avez été {mf|confronté|confrontée} depuis votre arrivée dans ma station. »
languages.original_text: "I once again offer my apologies for the sheer number of threats that Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} has encountered since arriving on my station."

traits.locale_text: « Une fois encore, je vous présente toutes mes excuses pour le nombre de menaces auxquelles vous avez été {mf|confronté|confrontée} depuis votre arrivée dans ma station. »

languages.text: "Ich möchte mich noch einmal für die schiere Anzahl bedrohlicher Situationen entschuldigen, denen Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} seit der Ankunft auf meiner Station ausgesetzt war."
languages.original_text: "I once again offer my apologies for the sheer number of threats that Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} has encountered since arriving on my station."

traits.locale_text: "Ich möchte mich noch einmal für die schiere Anzahl bedrohlicher Situationen entschuldigen, denen Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} seit der Ankunft auf meiner Station ausgesetzt war."

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin istasyonuma geldiğinden beri karşılaştığı çok sayıda tehdit için bir kez daha özür dilerim."
languages.original_text: "I once again offer my apologies for the sheer number of threats that Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} has encountered since arriving on my station."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretlerinin istasyonuma geldiğinden beri karşılaştığı çok sayıda tehdit için bir kez daha özür dilerim."
